**Tender Invitation - Mailroom Delivery Truck**
=============================================

**Solicitation Number:** 202305753
**Publication Date:** June 29, 2023
**Closing Date and Time:** August 8, 2023 at 2:00pm ET

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the provision of two (2) Mailroom Delivery Trucks in Ottawa, Ontario. The requirement includes an option for a third vehicle, which can be exercised within 12 months of contract award.

**Scope of Work:**
------------------

The RCMP requires two (2) Mailroom Delivery Trucks to support its mail delivery operations in Ottawa, Ontario. The preferred delivery date for the two (2) trucks is on or before March 31, 2024.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**
--------------------------------------

To be considered for an award, bidders must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

**Submission Instructions:**
---------------------------

Bids must be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French) and should be directed to:

RCMP/GRC - Bid Receiving Unit
73 Leikin Drive, Mail Stop #1
Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2
Email: [Zena.Besner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Zena.Besner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

**Important Notes:**

*   The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   Canada is not responsible for information found on websites of third parties.
*   It is the sole responsibility of the bidder to regularly consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date information.

**Additional Information:**

*   The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity.
*   Having a business profile in the IBD will increase your company’s visibility and may provide additional business opportunities.

The selected bidder will be required to provide two (2) Mailroom Delivery Trucks that meet the RCMP's specifications detailed in Annex "A" - Statement of Requirement. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest evaluated price.
